citation.article-title: Transfer of Bacteroides succinogenes (Hungate) to Fibrobacter gen. nov. as Fibrobacter succinogenes comb. nov. and description of Fibrobacter intestinalis sp. nov.

p.s: Description of Fibrobacter succinogenes subsp. succinogenes subsp. nov.
Fibrobacter succinogenes subsp. succinogenes (suc.ci.noâ€™ge.nes. M .L. n. acidum succinicum, succinic acid; Gr. v. gennaio, produce; M. L. adj. succinogenes, succinic acid producing)
Fibrobacter succinogenes subsp. succinogenes includes the coccoid strains, which do not consistently require PABA but may be stimulated by it.
